hardwareAbstraction
Class NXTRemoteUltrasonicPoller

java.lang.Object
  hardwareAbstraction.NXTRemoteUltrasonicPoller
All Implemented Interfaces:
RemoteCommands, UltrasonicPoller
public class NXTRemoteUltrasonicPoller
extends java.lang.Object
implements RemoteCommands, UltrasonicPoller

Abstraction layer for the ultrasonic poller over RS485. Uses methods from NXTRemoteCommand to send and receive appropriate data. Also implements RemoteCommands to assist with keeping track of command ids. Implements UltrasonicPoller to ensure all required methods are implemented as they were before.
